description:
After a big fight with Natsumi, Keroro runs away from the Hinata house and is surprised when no one tries to stop him. He takes up residence in a shoddy, uninhabited apartment, but how long can the sarge enjoy his new freedom before getting homesick?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, No~Leaving Home is Very Lonely
Quand on fugue, on se sent vraiment seul
ケロロ いや~家出ってホント寂しいもんですね であります
